name: SUBWAY JANITOR
description:
Intended to be played in Fullscreen.

Controls: 

Left Click - Mop

E - Pick Up and Interact

R - Put Away and Take Out Mop

A game about sanitation and cleanliness. The world is a disgusting place, but the cleaning company you work for is here to fix that. It's simply a shame that some people are not too excited by that idea.

Credits:

Peanut (@seancarts) - Programming and Art

Wilbe - Programming

Naza (@drawzanaza) - Art

Andrew Shank - Sound
